answers.answer: Ur chances are just the same as someone who has never miscarried. It is spontaneous although the chances are higher with twins. I had 2 miscarriages in a row but I had diabetes and pcos so my risk for miscarriage was extremely high. Though still went on to have 2 babies and am 21wks pregnant Sorry for your loss and congrats on ur pregnancy. Gdluck

question: I miss carried  twins about 5 months ago and I'm a couple weeks pregnant  now. What are the chances of me miss carrying again?
title: worried
